\subsection*{\color{chaos} The Problem}

When crypto crashes, you lose money. When it goes sideways, you make nothing. The only way to win is to perfectly time the market --- and nobody can do that consistently.

\textbf{What if a strategy could make money \textit{because} of the chaos --- not despite it?}

\subsection*{\color{chaos} The Solution}

CHAOS is a \textbf{treasury management protocol} on Cardano that \textbf{profits from price swings}.

Your capital is split into three parts and automatically rebalanced:

\begin{center}
\begin{tikzpicture}[
  box/.style={draw=gray200, fill=gray50, rounded corners=6pt,
              minimum width=2.2cm, minimum height=1.8cm, align=center,
              font=\small},
  arr/.style={->, thick, color=chaos}
]
\node[box] (ada) at (0,0) {{\large\bfseries\color{chaos}50\%}\\Volatile\\Asset};
\node[box] (djed) at (3,0) {{\large\bfseries\color{green}30\%}\\Stable-\\coin};
\node[box] (lp) at (6,0) {{\large\bfseries\color{amber}20\%}\\LP\\Fees};
\draw[arr] (ada.east) -- (djed.west);
\draw[arr] (djed.east) -- (lp.west);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{center}

When prices swing beyond 10\%, the protocol \textbf{sells high and buys low automatically}. Every round-trip generates profit. This is called \textbf{volatility harvesting} --- bigger swings mean bigger gains.
